post:
Shock Hosting is focused on providing high quality hosting at an affordable price.

We go the extra mile to ensure that you are always satisfied and receive the best possible experience.

Current Promotion

50% off for life on all Shared Hosting plans! This is a recurring discount that applies to all billing cycles.

Use promotional code "50OFF" at checkout. We accept PayPal, all major credit/debit cards and crypto currency.

Main Features
  • LiteSpeed Web Server With LSCache
  • Free Dedicated IP Address
  • Technical Support Available 24/7/365
  • 7 Day Money Back Guarantee
  • 99.9% Uptime Guarantee (SLA Policy)
  • Latest cPanel, CloudLinux and Softaculous
  • MailChannels Outbound Email Filtering
  • Free Migration From Other Providers
  • PHP Version Selector - 5.6, 7.0, 7.1, 7.2 or 7.3
  • Configure PHP Modules And Extensions
  • 20 Gbps Network Level DDoS Protection
  • 1 Gbps Redundant Network Uplinks
  • Hardware RAID 10 Protected SSD Storage
  • Daily JetBackup Backups (30 Day Retention)
  • Latest Stable MariaDB Server Version
  • CloudFlare cPanel Plugin With RailGun
  • Free Drag and Drop Website Builder
  • Free SSL Certificates (cPanel AutoSSL)


Datacenter Locations
  • Piscataway, New Jersey
  • Los Angeles, California
  • West Chicago, Illinois
  • Dallas, Texas
  • Amsterdam, Netherlands
  • Maidenhead, England
  • Singapore, Asia
  • Sydney, Australia
